mapper.sql: id, enterprise_id,rtc_enterprise_uuid, name, telephone, url, email, address, country_region, gmt_create, gmt_modify, status
mapper.insert: insert into qcc (id, enterprise_id,rtc_enterprise_uuid, name, telephone, url, email, address, country_region, gmt_create, gmt_modify, status) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER})

insert into qcc
id,
enterprise_id,
rtc_enterprise_uuid,
name,
telephone,
url,
email,
address,
country_region,
gmt_create,
gmt_modify,
status,
#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER},
#{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
mapper.update:
update qcc
enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
rtc_enterprise_uuid = #{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
country_region = #{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update qcc set enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, rtc_enterprise_uuid = #{rtcEnterpriseUuid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, telephone = #{telephone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, url = #{url,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, email = #{email,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, address = #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, country_region = #{countryRegion,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, gmt_create = #{gmtCreate,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, gmt_modify = #{gmtModify,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, status = #{status,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: SELECT qcc.id, qcc.enterprise_id enterpriseId, qcc.name, qbi.registered_capital registeredCapital, qbi.legal_representative legalRepresentative, qbi.establishment_date establishmentDate, qcc.address FROM qcc left join qcc_business_information qbi on qcc.enterprise_id=qbi.enterprise_id WHERE qcc.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and qcc.name like concat('%',#{name},'%')

SELECT qcc.id, qcc.enterprise_id, qcc.name, qbi.registered_capital, qbi.legal_representative, qbi.establishment_date, qcc.address, qcc.telephone, qcc.url, `qcc_shareholder`.`id` qs_id, `qcc_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` qs_enterprise_id, qcc_shareholder.`name` qs_name, `qcc_shareholder`.`ratio` qs_ratio, `qcc_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital` qs_subscribed_capital, `qcc_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_date` qs_subscribed_capital_date FROM qcc LEFT JOIN qcc_business_information qbi ON qcc.enterprise_id = qbi.enterprise_id LEFT JOIN `qcc_shareholder` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` WHERE qcc.`status` = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and qcc.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT qcc_administrative_license.id, qcc_administrative_license.enterprise_id enterpriseId, qcc_administrative_license.decision_document_no decision_documentNo, qcc_administrative_license.license_authority licenseAuthority, qcc_administrative_license.license_date licenseDate, qcc_administrative_license.content, qcc_administrative_license.valid_from validFrom, qcc_administrative_license.valid_until validUntil, qcc_administrative_license.decision_document_name decisionDocumentName FROM qcc_administrative_license WHERE qcc_administrative_license.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and qcc_administrative_license.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_annual_report`.`id`, `qcc_annual_report`.`uuid`, `qcc_annual_report`.`enterprise_id`, `qcc_annual_report`.`year`, `qcc_annual_report`.`unified_social_credit_code`, `qcc_annual_report`.`registration_number`, `qcc_annual_report`.`business_status`, `qcc_annual_report`.`business_telephone`, `qcc_annual_report`.`e_mail`, `qcc_annual_report`.`post_code`, `qcc_annual_report`.`staff_number`, `qcc_annual_report`.`equity_transfer`, `qcc_annual_report`.`purchase_equity`, `qcc_annual_report`.`postal_address`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_assets`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_equity`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_operating_income`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_profit`, `qcc_annual_report`.`net_profit`, `qcc_annual_report`.`main_business_income`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_tax`, `qcc_annual_report`.`total_liabilities`, `qcc_annual_report`.`endowment_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`medical_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`maternity_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`unemployment_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report`.`employment_injury_insurance`, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`id` s_id, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`annual_report_uuid` s_annual_report_uuid, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`enterprise_id` s_enterprise_id, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`name` s_name, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital` s_subscribed_capital, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_date` s_subscribed_capital_date, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`subscribed_capital_way` s_subscribed_capital_way, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital` s_paid_capital, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital_date` s_paid_capital_date, `qcc_annual_report_shareholder`.`paid_capital_way` s_paid_capital_way FROM `qcc_annual_report` LEFT JOIN qcc_annual_report_shareholder ON qcc_annual_report.uuid = qcc_annual_report_shareholder.annual_report_uuid WHERE qcc_annual_report.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and `qcc_annual_report`.`enterprise_id` = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select id, enterprise_id enterpriseId, name, code, qualification_type qualificationType, competent_tax_authority competentTaxAuthority, valid_from validFrom, valid_end validEnd from qcc_general_taxpayer where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

select id, enterprise_id enterpriseId, name, duty, shareholding_ratio shareholdingRatio, ultimate_beneficial_shares ultimateBeneficialShares from qcc_keyman where enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and `status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}

SELECT `qcc_bidding`.`id`,`qcc_bidding`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_bidding`.`name`,`qcc_bidding`.`province`,`qcc_bidding`.`progress` FROM `qcc_bidding` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`id`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`location`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`purpose`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`area`, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`administrative_region` administrativeRegion, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`land_supply_mode` landSupplyMode, `qcc_land_purchase_information`.`contract_signing_date` contractSigningDate FROM `qcc_land_purchase_information` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_supplier`.`id`, `qcc_supplier`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_supplier`.`name`, `qcc_supplier`.`proportion_of_procurement` proportionOfProcurement, `qcc_supplier`.`purchase_amount` purchaseAmount, `qcc_supplier`.`report_period` reportPeriod, `qcc_supplier`.`source`, `qcc_supplier`.`relationship` FROM `qcc_supplier` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`id`, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`determine_document_number` determineDocumentNumber, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`violations_type` violationsType, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`content`, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`publication_date` publicationDate, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`decision_making_organ` decisionMakingOrgan, `qcc_administrative_sanction`.`decision_date` decisionDate FROM `qcc_administrative_sanction` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_financing_consultation`.`id`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`date`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`name`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`financing_round` financingRound, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`amount`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`investor`, `qcc_financing_consultation`.`source` FROM `qcc_financing_consultation` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_app`.`id`, `qcc_app`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_app`.`name`, `qcc_app`.`sort`, `qcc_app`.`current_version` currentVersion, `qcc_app`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_app` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_applet`.`id`, `qcc_applet`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_applet`.`name`, `qcc_applet`.`sort`, `qcc_applet`.`associated_official_account` associatedOfficialAccount, `qcc_applet`.`predict_reading_volume` predictReadingVolume FROM `qcc_applet` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_wechat`.`id`, `qcc_wechat`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_wechat`.`name`, `qcc_wechat`.`account`, `qcc_wechat`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_wechat` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_weibo`.`id`, `qcc_weibo`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_weibo`.`nickname`, `qcc_weibo`.`industry_category` industryCategory, `qcc_weibo`.`brief_introduction` briefIntroduction FROM `qcc_weibo` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT `qcc_software_copyright`.`id`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`enterprise_id` enterpriseId, `qcc_software_copyright`.`name`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`version`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`release_date` releaseDate, `qcc_software_copyright`.`abbreviation`, `qcc_software_copyright`.`registration_number` registrationNumber, `qcc_software_copyright`.`registration_approval_date` registrationApprovalDate FROM `qcc_software_copyright` WHERE status = ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED} and enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR}

SELECT qcc.id qcc_id, qcc.enterprise_id qcc_enterprise_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`id` qre_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`enterprise_id` qre_enterprise_id, `qcc_remove_exception`.`save_reason` qre_save_reason, `qcc_remove_exception`.`desicion_authority` qre_desicion_authority, `qcc_remove_exception`.`remove_date` qre_remove_date, `qcc_remove_exception`.`remove_reason` qre_remove_reason, `qcc_save_exception`.`id`, `qcc_save_exception`.`enterprise_id`, `qcc_save_exception`.`save_date`, `qcc_save_exception`.`desicion_authority`, `qcc_save_exception`.`save_reason` FROM qcc LEFT JOIN `qcc_remove_exception` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_remove_exception`.`enterprise_id` LEFT JOIN `qcc_save_exception` ON qcc.enterprise_id = `qcc_save_exception`.`enterprise_id` WHERE qcc.enterprise_id = #{enterpriseId, jdbcType=VARCHAR} and qcc.`status`= ${@com.rtc.manager.util.CommonConst@STATUS_USED}
